TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CCMoveBy extends CocosSharp.CCFiniteTimeAction

Docs.summary: Moves a Node object x,y pixels by modifying it's position attribute. x and y are relative to the position of the object. Several actions can be concurrently called, and the resulting movement will be the sum of individual movements. v2.1beta2-custom

remarks.para: When this action is added to a CCNode, the action will run over a period of time.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(float32 duration, valuetype CocosSharp.CCPoint position) cil managed
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class CocosSharp.CCFiniteTimeAction Reverse() cil managed

Docs.summary: returns a new action that performs the exactly the reverse action

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance class CocosSharp.CCActionState StartAction(class CocosSharp.CCNode target) cil managed

Docs.param: Target object on which the action will be performed.

summary.para: Starts the action on the specified target

remarks.para: This creates a new state object of type that will track the state of the action.
This method is typically invoked by implementations of CCActions or by the CocosSharp runtime, when you invoke the method.
